page.title: 01MOUNTSORREL & ROTHLEY REVIEW
page.content: { Mountsorrel},pop.6o50,and{Rothley Pop.5000 8(est)are two villages linked by the A.6 and the B5351. Mountsorrel has a massive Quarry and the {Rolls Royce}factory of famous name is on the boundary. Rothley has 10 small factories. Farmland separates both villages. Private houses cost more in Rothley. There is new residential building in the central area. There is local authority housing in both villages. { Recent parish boundary changes {have been hotly fought over.}Each village has its own excellent Primary School,Mountsorrel's roll is 241 and Rothley's is 227.{Despite traditional {rivalry between villages (for each {village wants to keep its own {identity) there is some inter-school {and inter-church co-operation.This {project for the BBC is a good example.
